thread.title: Tunisia arrests 12 following terrorist beach killings
thread.title_full: Tunisia arrests 12 following terrorist beach killings

title: Tunisia arrests 12 following terrorist beach killings
text:
Tunisia arrests 12 following terrorist beach killings 2 July 2015 Save 
Tunisia has arrested 12 people in connection with last week’s mass shooting at a beach near Sousse. 
According to the BBC , security forces are still hunting for two men suspected of having trained the gunman. 
Student Seifeddine Rezgui killed 38 people, 22 of whom were First Choice and Thomson customers. 
In March 22 people were killed in an attack on the country’s Bardo Museum. 
“This is a group who were trained in Libya, and who had the same objective. Two attacked the Bardo and one attacked Sousse,” Lazhar Akremi, minister for parliamentary relations, said, according to Reuters. 
“Police are hunting for two more,” Akremi is quoted as saying.
